content: Do we want to have meetings at all-hands? cc @WG-async-foundations @DPC
Having a time slot available for that seems useful.
Yeah I'm sure we'll want to dedicate some time to this topic. I guess this might be a group that's worth considering separately from lang/compiler
Reserving a seperate slot for this. Thanks
I'm fairly happy to give t-lang slots over to t-compiler (+wgs) myself this year
